data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: If you were given one wish but you had to use it for someone else, what would you wish for? Explain your reasoning.
data.answer: I wish a happy life to that person because happiness is the most important thing people need to receive a sense of felicity. If my wish for this person is to be as wealthy as Elon Musk, he or she would become rich but still might experience a miserable life. He or she might lose things they treasure while getting rich. However, if this person can be happy all the time, her positive attitude is good enough for her to receive blessedness.
